Mr. Speaker, I rise today in support of H.R. 3497, the Medal of  Sacrifice Act.

Every year, over 100 sworn law enforcement officers and over 100  firefighters die while on duty or from hazardous conditions related to  their service.

…the Senate and House of Representatives of       the United States of America in Congress assembled,            SECTION 1. SHORT TITLE.

This Act may be cited as the ``Medal of Sacrifice Act of       2025''.       SEC. 2. MEDAL OF SACRIFICE FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS AND                     FIRST RESPONDERS.

(a) Medal of Sacrifice for Law Enforcement…

…sincerely thank my colleagues on both sides  of the aisle for their work on this piece of legislation.

Mr. Speaker, I rise today in support of my bill, H.R. 3497, the Medal  of Sacrifice Act. Its purpose is singular. It is of the highest  importance to honor fallen law enforcement officers and first  responders.
